brief.content-text:
Two Diagrams
Diagram 1, Image
The diagram depicts the TCP/IP Protocols Properties window that is displayed in the Windows XP operating system. This box displays the typical static entries for network addressing. When the option, Use the following IP Address, is selected, the following entries are displayed:

IP Address: 192.168.1.32.
Subnet Mask: 255.255.255.0.
Default Gateway: 192.168.1.1.

When the option, Use the following DNS server addresses, is selected, the following entries are displayed:
Preferred DNS server: 172.16.33.5.
Alternate DNS server: 172.16.33.6.
